item.description:
The public is invited every Wed. evening for some combination of mediation, study, guest speaker, discussion, socializing… Free and open to the public (donations welcome).

On July 25, guest speaker, Prasannavajri, presents “Giving Up Our Timeshare With The Kleshas.” The energy associated with kleshas (translated as 'neurosis', 'afflictions', or 'defiled emotions') easily enslaves us and causes us to act and speak in unintelligent ways. Conversely, awareness of kleshas can benefit our passage toward spiritual maturity. Join us for an amazing internal 'road trip'!

Note: Nagaloka also offers mediation sessions (open to the public, donations welcome) on Sundays, 8:30 - 10:00 am, Mondays, 6:30 -7:30 pm, Thursdays, noon- 1:00 pm (with guided instruction, so best choice for beginners) and Thursdays 5:30 - 6:30 pm

FMI, www.nagalokabuddhistcenter.org, 207-774-1545, or email dharmasuri@gmail.com to receive weekly email announcements of upcoming events.
item.name: Wednesday ‘Friends’ Night at Nagaloka Buddhist Center
